title: While She Was Sleeping
description: Jasmine, niece of John's ex-wife, is staying the weekend with him. He's dreading it. She demands he take her out to a club, and when they arrive home, she's a wreck. She teases and torments John before passing out. John decides it's time she gets her comeuppance... while she's sleeping.This sizzling 10,000+ word novelette sees John getting back at Jasmine in her sleep. WARNING: Contains themes of dubious consent & reluctance, revenge sex, and graphic, explicit descriptions of cunnilingus, and vaginal penetration, and orgasm & ejaculation.
author: Audrey Grace
